explains: n. 前景；最显著的位置

sentences.en: You haven't drawn the figures in the foreground in proportion.
sentences.cn: 你的前景人物画得不合比例。

sentences.en: He is the bowler-hatted figure in the foreground of Orpen's famous painting.
sentences.cn: 他就是奥彭名画的前景中那个戴圆顶礼帽的人物。

sentences.en: In the foreground, the lobby was dark, sleepy.
sentences.cn: 在前景，大厅是黑暗的，令人昏昏欲睡。
